articles.title: 3rd dose of Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine lowers infection risk, Israel study finds - Globalnews.ca
articles.description: U.S. has announced plans to offer COVID-19 booster shots to all Americans, citing data showing diminishing protection. Canada, France and Germany have announced booster campaigns.
